name: Tra Tani
description:
TRA Tani is an innovative artistic collaboration between Libyan youth, it includes many different puzzles featuring diverse artworks, all provided by very talented Libyan artists.

The goal of the game is to promote Libyan visual art in a new and creative manner, all while featuring messages promoting peace and peaceful coexistence.


TRA Tani is the sequel to TRA with a lot more levels, and a lot more fun :)
